-- bind (>>=) :: Monad m => m a -> (a -> m b) -> m b
on bind(m, mf)
    set c to class of m
    if c = list then
        bindList(m, mf)
    else if c = record then
        set ks to keys(m)
        if ks contains "type" then
            set t to type of m
            if t = "Maybe" then
                bindMay(m, mf)
            else if t = "Either" then
                bindEither(m, mf)
            else if t = "Tuple" then
                bindTuple(m, mf)
            else
                Nothing()
            end if
        else
            Nothing()
        end if
    else
        Nothing()
    end if
end bind
